title: Black screen
body: How can i resolve this? (see in link)

replies.body: Heya, this black screen is likely being caused by a connection problem that's failing to load assets.  Log out for now and run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear up some blocks.  It should strengthen up your network and load up your client.

i have the same problem, once the game loads its fine but it can be quite annoying when trying to ban or chose a champ or really anything. generally the only thing ive found to temporarily fix this is to restart client.
